{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3223751,"name":"Ezriel Nagaokar","username":"Ezriel","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ezriel/{size}/194855_2.png","created_at":"2023-08-08T07:44:46.768Z","cooked":"

Hi cd,
my team is new into image processing, we want to improve our control on the robot, how do you recommend us to do this ?

We’re started working with photonvision on limelight (we have also raspberry pi and nvidia jetson nano)

Thanks

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2023-08-08T07:44:46.768Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":17,"reads":136,"readers_count":135,"score":112.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":439609,"topic_slug":"how-to-improve-control-and-image-processing","display_username":"Ezriel Nagaokar","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57540,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/how-to-improve-control-and-image-processing/439609/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3223771,"name":"Kerem ","username":"keremucarer","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/keremucarer/{size}/208560_2.png","created_at":"2023-08-08T12:58:12.169Z","cooked":"

If you’re a new team on vision processing, understanding the logic of vision to start might be great for your team.

After some managements on limelight, your team can work for following apriltags and detecting game pieces (also affiliated with Charged Up game mission) with limelight+chasis combination. This experience can be great for following off-seasons and seasons for sure.

After your team got the logic, members can work on more complicated or specialized vision missions with Pi, Jetson Nano etc. (But it can be difficult for the team after experiencing the conveniences of Limelight)
